description: This file configures the Angular application by setting up providers such as zone change detection, routing, and client hydration strategies.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular's zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up the application's routing using specified routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration features, possibly for server-side rendering.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay for hydration to improve user experience during client initialization.
